channel.title: Team on Simon says
channel.description: Recent content in Team on Simon says

item.title: Rock Star Programmers
item.description: Sometimes I come across programmers that view themselves as rock stars. Some even label themselves code ninjas. As if they are some kind of programming super hero with special powers. While a do realize where this comes from. A good programmer can easily be more then ten times as productive as an average one. We do also need good raw models and front figures for our profession. Programming is not a one man show.
